original_text: A hungry man may dream that he is eating a big meal. But as soon as he wakes up, he knows that he is still hungry! A thirsty man may dream that he is drinking. But as soon as he wakes up, he knows that he is still weak and thirsty. That is what it will be like for the great armies from all the nations that have come to attack Mount Zion.
korean_text: 주린 자가 꿈에 먹었을지라도 깨면 그 속은 여전히 비고 목마른 자가 꿈에 마셨을지라도 깨면 곤비하며 그 속에 갈증이 있는 것 같이 시온 산을 치는 열방의 무리가 그와 같으리라

sentences.korean_translation: 배고픈 사람은 꿈을 꿀 수 있다

sentences.original_text: that he is eating a big meal
But as soon as he wakes up
he knows that he is still hungry!
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신이 여전히 배고프다는 것을 안다!
목마른 사람은 꿈을 꿀 수 있다

sentences.original_text: But as soon as he wakes up
he knows that he is still weak and thirsty
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신이 여전히 약하고 목마르다는 것을 안다

sentences.original_text: That is what it will be like
for the great armies from all the nations
that have come to attack Mount Zion
